properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 1:50PM CST until February 11 at 5:50AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Village Creek At At Avenue W Affecting Jefferson County.

.Heavy rainfall today is pushing rises along Village Creek...
and a flood warning is now in effect for Village Creek at Avenue W.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Village Creek At At Avenue W.
* until late tonight...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At  1:15 PM Monday The stage Was 7.1 feet.
* Flood stage is 10 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise to near 10.5 feet during the next couple of hours
and then begin to fall.
* Impact...At 11 feet...Sections of the road in the digest area of
the water treatment plant are flooded. Additional flooding in the
digest area of the water treatment plant occurs and increases as
the creek level rises.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by this evening...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
